welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Upper Uwchlan, where small-town charm meets modern amenities. Known for its scenic landscapes and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipalcipal/Spaatz Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Municipalcipal/Spaatz Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport handles a large volume of freight and packages for commercial airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Primarily used by American Airlines for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a free option for basic internet access and a paid option for faster speeds.
